de.eckhartarnold.client

Class SlideshowPresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.eckhartarnold.client.Presentation
      • de.eckhartarnold.client.SlideshowPresentation

  • public class SlideshowPresentation
extends Presentation
    A simpler version of class GalleryPresentation which only "presents" the slide show an omits the gallery page.
    Author:
    ecki

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        public void onClick(ClickEvent event)
        Click handler for the HOME-Button of the control panel. Jumps back to the first picture. (In the galler presentation it jumps to the gallery instead.
        Parameters:
        event - a click event This may also be null if the caller is not a widget object.
        See Also:
        GalleryPresentation)
